description: The nutty flavours of the browned butter combine well with the fragrant herbs in the lobster dish.
name: Grilled Lobster with Brown Butter Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lobster tails, meat removed, sinue removed and chopped
1 lemon, sliced into wedges for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a pan to a medium heat and then add 3 tablespoons of butter and allow to brown.
Add the garlic, lobster and lardons to the pan and fry for 4 minutes while tossing.
Cook the pasta as per packet instructions and then drain and set to one side.
Add the herbs and tomatoes to the pan with the rest of the butter and fry for a further 3 minutes.
Add the cooked pasta to the pan and combine fully with the pan ingredients for 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat, grate the gruyere over the dish and serve a lemon wedge on the side.
